ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Closed Lost" stage of Opportunities in the "Product" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Lost'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(StageName,""), ISPICKVAL(Close_Lost_Reason__c,"") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark 'Closed Lost' stage as complete, please ensure below key field is populated: Closed Lost Reason.
